<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Dust](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2978)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=629" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=662" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are trained in Stealth
</row>

</column>

---

This small vial is filled with a grayish-green dust rendered from dried ectoplasm. When you activate the dust, it casts a 4th-rank [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell on you. You may then Stride or Step. You can instead Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim if you have the corresponding Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghost Dust
